mapper.select: select FARMNAME,(select CANALNAME from WATER_SITE_B s where s.CANALCODE=b.CANALCODE) as CANALNAME,AREA,CONVERT(INT,AREA*BASEWATER) AS BASEWATER,CONVERT(INT,AREA*SAVEONEUP) AS ONEUPLIM,CONVERT(INT,AREA*SAVETWOUP) AS TWOUPLIM,t.BASEPRICE,t.ONEPRICE,t.TOWPRICE,t.THRPRICE from (select FARMCODE,FARMNAME,CANALCODE,AREA from WATER_FARM_USERS where SYSSIGN=#{showsign} and FARMCODE=#{stcd}) b cross join (select * from WATER_PRICE_STANDARD where PRICEYR=(select MAX(PRICEYR) from WATER_PRICE_STANDARD where PRICEYR <=#{year})) t

select sum(BUYWATER) as BUYWATER,sum(BASEWATER) as BASEWATER,sum(BUYFIRST) as BUYFIRST,sum(BUYSECOND) as BUYSECOND,sum(BUYTHIRD) as BUYTHIRD from WATER_RECHARGE where FARMCODE=#{stcd} and DATEPART(year,CREATETIME)=#{year}
